name: One Strike Demo
description:
Hi guys! First, I would like to thank you all for the amazing support I've received here in itch.io. Without it, One Strike would never become a reality.

Second, I would like to invite you to visit the One Strike Steam page:

http://store.steampowered.com/app/718730/

The game release is getting pretty close (probably in the end this month/start of the next month), so, stay tuned for more news!

I Hope you like it.

https://twitter.com/dmbarbosa1

Created by: Danilo Moreira.
